name: Cherry Wine Sauce for Angel Food Cake
keywords: angel food cake, cherries, wine, dessert
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup dessert wine, like late harvest riesling

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cherries, wine and sugar, and cook over medium heat just until cherries are plump and soft. Puree with 3/4 cup of the yogurt until smooth. Refrigerate until serving time.
Return to room temperature, and serve angel cake slices topped with the cherry sauce and remaining yogurt.
